original_text: And as the redemption price for the 273 of the firstborn of the people of Israel, over and above the number of the male Levites,
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손의 처음 태어난 자가 레위인보다 이백칠십삼 명이 더 많은즉 속전으로

sentences.original_text: And as the redemption price for the 273 of the firstborn of the people of Israel,
over and above the number of the male Levites,
